text:
1. Stand facing a wall.
2. Place your hands on the wall at shoulder height, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
3. Step back a few feet from the wall, keeping your body straight and your feet hip-width apart.
4. Lower your chest towards the wall by bending your elbows, while keeping your body in a straight line.
5. Push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
6. Repeat the movement for the desired number of repetitions.
